title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 71.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 71.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

As part of the anti-theft program, the Legislature enacted
chapter 976 of the Laws of 1981. This legislation requires or authorizes the

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to promulgate regulations concerning the
issuance of new vehicle identification numbers and part identification numbers, determining when an identification number is destroyed, removed, altered, defaced or effectively concealed and deciding the steps to be followed in
notifying a true owner of the recovery of a stolen vehicle or
part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
71.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
